import React from 'react' import {Card, Grid, CardContent, Typography, CardActions, Button} from '@mui/material'; import stripHtml from 'cli-strip-html' const ProductItem = ({ product, onAddToCart }) => { const handleAddToCart = () => { onAddToCart(product.id, 1) } return (

{product.name}

 {product.description}
) } export default ProductItem;
